Module kivakit.ui.desktop
Package com.telenav.kivakit.ui.desktop.graphics.drawing

Interface CoordinateSystem

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Coordinated, com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.interfaces.naming.Named
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DrawingSurface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DrawingCoordinateSystem, Java2dDrawingSurface
    public interface CoordinateSystem
extends com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.interfaces.naming.Named, Coordinated
    An abstract, bounded coordinate system with an x(), y() origin() and a width() and height() extent(), all in coordinate system defined units. Coordinates can be mapped to another coordinate system with toCoordinates(Coordinated, DrawingPoint) and other similar convenience methods.
    Author:
    jonathanl (shibo)
